column2: "Na wohun asɛnkyerɛdze kɛse bi wɔ sor: ɔbaa a ofura ewia
column4: na nworaba duebien ahenkyɛw wɔ n’etsifi;"

column2: "na onyinsen: na ɔrekeka mu roko awoo
"Na wohun asɛnkyerɛdze fofor bi so wɔ sor; na hwɛ
column3: sasabɔnsam kɔkɔɔ kokroko a ɔwɔ etsir esuon nye mmbɛn du

column2: "Na no dua twee ɔsor nworaba nkyekyɛmu ebiasa mu kor
column3: na ɔtotowee guu asaase do. Na sasabɔnsam no gyinaa ɔbaa no a ɔrobɔwo no enyim

column2: "Na ɔwoo babanyin a ɔdze dadze poma robɔhwɛ amanaman nyina do: na wohwiim ne ba no kɔr Nyankopɔn nkyɛn
"Na ɔbaa no guanee kɔr sar do mbrɛ Nyankopɔn esiesie beebi ama no
column3: dɛ wɔnyɛn no wɔ hɔ nda apem ahaenu eduosia."

column2: "Na akodzi baa sor: Maekɛl nye n’abɔfoe nye sasabɔnsam no dzii ako
column3: na sasabɔnsam nye n’abɔfoe no wɔkoe;"
eso woennya tsenabea wɔ sor bio."
ɔwɔ dadaw no a wɔfrɛ no Abɔnsam nye Satan no
column6: na wɔtoow n’abɔfoe kaa no ho gui."

column2: "Na metsee ndze kɛse bi wɔ sor dɛ
column5: nye ahendzi nye ne Kraest no tumdzi no aba: osiandɛ wɔatow hɛn nuanom hɔn toafo no akyen
column6: ɔno a ɔtoatoa hɔn wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim adzekyee nye adzesaa no."

column3: nye hɔn dasesɛm do dzii konyim; osiandɛ wɔanndɔ hɔn nkwa araa dze kodur wu mu."
nye hom a hom tsetse no mu no
column4: hom ndzi dɛw. Na asaase nye po ndue: osiandɛ abɔnsam dze ebufuw kɛse esian aba hom nkyɛn
column5: osiandɛ onyim dɛ ne ber a ɔwɔ yɛ tsia."

column2: "Na sasabɔnsam no hun dɛ wɔatow no akyen asaase do no
column3: ɔtaa ɔbaa no a ɔwoo ɔbabanyin no do."

column2: "Na wɔdze ɔkorpɔn ne ntsaban ebien no maa ɔbaa no
column3: dɛ ɔmfa ntu nkɔ ne tsenabea wɔ sar no do

column2: "Na ɔwɔ no puuw n’anomu nsu dɛ esutsen guu ɔbaa no ekyir
column3: dɛ ɔbɛma esu no afa no akɔ."
na asaase buee n’anomu na ɔmeen esutsen no a sasabɔnsam no puwii fii n’anomu no."

column2: "Na sasabɔnsam no bo fuuw ɔbaa no; na okotuu n’asefo nkaa a wosie Nyankopɔn ahyɛdze
column3: na wokitsa Jesus dasedzi mu no hɔn do sa."
